SELECT sr.`req_num` AS "reqNum" ,sr.`org_id_` AS "orgId" ,sr.`org_name`AS "orgName" ,sr.`business_id` AS "businessId" ,sr.`business_area` AS "businessArea" ,sr.`product_id_` AS "productId" ,sr.`product_name` AS "productName" ,sr.`advisor_account` AS "advisorAccount" ,sr.`advisor_name` AS "advisorName" ,DATE_FORMAT(sr.`created_time`,"%Y/%m/%d")AS requireTime ,CASE sr.`status` WHEN '1' THEN "待处理" WHEN '2' THEN "已处理" when '-1' then "已撤销" ELSE '--' END AS "status" ,CASE sr.handle_result WHEN '1' THEN "对接成功" WHEN '2' THEN "对接失败" WHEN '3' THEN "企业需求撤销" WHEN '4' THEN "未对接" ELSE '--' END AS "handleResult" ,case sr.is_comment when '0' then "未点评" when '1' then "已点评" else '--' end as "isComment" ,tsr.attitude_score as "ratingScore" ,tsr.evaluation_desc as "evaluationDesc" FROM tb_service_require sr left join tb_service_rating tsr on sr.id=tsr.require_id WHERE 1=1 and sr.record_status='1' AND sr.issue_account=#{account}
and (sr.product_id_ like CONCAT('%', #{requireOtherParam.intentProduct}, '%') or sr.product_name like CONCAT('%', #{requireOtherParam.intentProduct}, '%'))
and (sr.org_id_ like CONCAT('%', #{requireOtherParam.intentOrg}, '%') or sr.org_name like CONCAT('%', #{requireOtherParam.intentOrg}, '%'))
and sr.handle_result=#{requireOtherParam.handleResult}
and sr.status= '1'
and sr.status= '2' and sr.handle_result='1' and sr.is_comment='0'
and sr.status= '2' and sr.handle_result='1' and sr.is_comment='1'
order by sr.`created_time` desc, sr.issue_account desc

SELECT sr.`req_num` AS "reqNum" ,sr.`org_id_` AS "orgId" ,sr.`org_name`AS "orgName" ,sr.`business_id` AS "businessId" ,sr.`business_area` AS "businessArea" ,sr.`product_id_` AS "productId" ,sr.`product_name` AS "productName" ,sr.`advisor_account` AS "advisorAccount" ,sr.`advisor_name` AS "advisorName" ,DATE_FORMAT(sr.`created_time`,"%Y/%m/%d")AS requireTime ,CASE sr.`status` WHEN '1' THEN "待处理" WHEN '2' THEN "已处理" when '-1' then "已撤销" ELSE '--' END AS "status" ,CASE sr.handle_result WHEN '1' THEN "对接成功" WHEN '2' THEN "对接失败" WHEN '3' THEN "企业需求撤销" WHEN '4' THEN "未对接" ELSE '--' END AS "handleResult" ,case sr.is_comment when '0' then "未点评" when '1' then "已点评" else '--' end as "isComment" ,tsr.attitude_score as "ratingScore" ,tsr.evaluation_desc as "evaluationDesc" FROM tb_service_require sr left join tb_service_rating tsr on sr.id=tsr.require_id
left join tb_service_and_advisor tsa on sr.product_id_=tsa.product_id_
WHERE 1=1 and sr.record_status='1'
AND tsa.advisor_account=#{account}
and sr.product_id_ in ( select sp.product_id_ from tb_service_product sp where 1=1 and sp.org_id_=#{orgId} and sp.record_status='1' and sp.status='1' ) and sr.advisor_account is null and sr.advisor_name is null
and (sr.product_id_ like CONCAT('%', #{requireReceivedParam.intentProduct}, '%') or sr.product_name like CONCAT('%', #{requireReceivedParam.intentProduct}, '%'))
and sr.handle_result=#{requireReceivedParam.handleResult}
and (sr.req_name like CONCAT('%', #{requireReceivedParam.requirePerson}, '%') or sr.issue_account like CONCAT('%', #{requireReceivedParam.requirePerson}, '%'))
and sr.status= '1'
and sr.status= '2' and sr.handle_result='1' and sr.is_comment='0'
and sr.status= '2' and sr.handle_result='1' and sr.is_comment='1'
order by sr.`created_time` desc ,sr.issue_account desc

SELECT sr.req_num AS "reqNum" ,sr.`business_area` AS "businessArea" ,sr.`org_name` AS "orgName" ,IFNULL(sr.`advisor_name`,"未指定") AS "advisorName" ,sr.issue_account AS "issueAccount" ,sr.`product_name` AS "productName" ,CASE sp.product_type WHEN '0' THEN "常规服务产品" WHEN '1' THEN "特色服务产品" ELSE '' END AS "productType" ,DATE_FORMAT(sr.`issue_time`,"%Y/%m/%d")AS issueTime ,sr.req_name as "reqName" ,sr.req_phone as "reqPhone" ,sr.req_email as "reqEmail" ,sr.contract_amount as "contractAmount" ,sr.req_detail as "requireDetail" ,CASE sr.handle_result WHEN '1' THEN "对接成功" WHEN '2' THEN "对接失败" WHEN '3' THEN "企业需求撤销" WHEN '4' THEN "未对接" ELSE '暂无' END AS "handleResult" ,IFNULL(sr.result_detail,"暂无") as "resultDetail" ,sr.financing_amount as "financingAmount" ,sr.financing_period_max as "financingPeriod" ,sr.actual_loan_amount as "actualLoanAmount" ,sr.funds_req_desc as "fundsReqDesc" ,DATE_FORMAT(sr.expected_date,"%Y-%m-%d")as "expectedDate" ,sr.contract_home_page as "contractHomePage" ,sr.contract_end_page as "contractEndPage" ,tsr.attitude_score as "ratingScore" ,tsr.evaluation_desc as "evaluationDesc" FROM tb_service_require sr left join tb_service_rating tsr on sr.id=tsr.require_id LEFT JOIN tb_service_product sp ON sr.product_id_=sp.product_id_ where 1=1 and sr.req_num=#{reqNum}
